author: admin
title: NOA frowns at Nigerians calling Nigeria 'Naija' - NAIJ.COM
text: NOA frowns at Nigerians calling Nigeria 'Naija' - NAIJ.COM NAIJ.COM “That the more we use these misnomers referring to our country, the fallout of it is that, a significant percentage of our younger ones will not even remember that Nigeria is the original name of our country. “I want to appeal to all Nigerians , young …
